channel.title: [317] Project X [317] Look here! [UPDATED]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://clip2net.com/clip/m46768/1275329292-29345-67kb.png?nocache=1[/img][/center]
[center] [u][b]Currently Working on the Server[/b][/u][/center] [center]-- Infinity Zr (me) --[/center]
[center][u][b]What is Project X?[/b][/u][/center] [center]Project X is a server for people to have fun on there will be no Buying/selling Staff spots! This will be based of Delta/Chosen pkz[/center]
[center][u][b]Why this server[/b][/u][/center] [center]Becuase it is a delta/chosen pkz source i am able to learn more from it instead of shooting to Hyperon/Riotscape sources i want to take my time through a delta source before going onto the more cleaned and stable sources![/center]
[center][u][b]Forums/Host[/b][/u][/center] [center]The forums will be a SMF dont want to get Nulled vbulletin! The host will be on my Pc a Dual core Processer with 1gb of ram and 250gb of HDD i am hoping this will hold 50+ players[/center]
[center][u][b]Client/Server coders[/b][/u][/center] [center]Yes i will need client coders but not at the very moment atm i know alot about Clients so i think i will be able to manage i will let you know if i need Server/Client coders but atm i dont need any![/center]
[center][u][b]What are you trying to Accomplish[/b][/u][/center] [center]Nothing i just want to get players and a great community.[/center]
[center][u][b]Customs Items[/b][/u][/center] [center]There will be customs like GodSwords/D claws but there will be nothing like Crappy Recoloured of stupid swords ect..[/center]
[center][u][b]Minigames[/b][/u][/center] [center]There will be 90% pest control i am working on atm (Not sure if im going to add the npcs) Barrows 50% stupid methods.! Fighting caves 70% there needs to be a reward and a correct timer! assault minigame keeping the same CBA with that Tbh its 100% UGLY![/center]
[center][u][b]Combat/skills[/b][/u][/center] [center]Attack 10% redoing the hole System will post a pic later strenght 100% Magic 90% Mage done Range 100% Range Done Hp 100% Defence 100% Prayer 85% Need the new prayer interface
Non Combat skills WoodCutting 100% you now need the certain axes to WC Firemaking 100% works fine to me Herblore 50% Shitty delta base Farming 50% shitty delta base Aglity 70% not a very good base Thieving 100% done It is now handle in a handler (Thieving.java) RuneCraft 100% going to leave it and maybe update in the future Crafting 88% just need to add some more junk instead of crafting amulets Fletching 100% works fine (delta base 100% credits to him) Slayer 80% adding some more areas Mining/Smithing 90% interfaces are not added. Fishing/cooking 90% adding more places to fish and Adding a method to cook on a fire (Maybe add a certain level to cook fish on logs.)[/center]
[center][u][b]Client Update log [/b][/u][/center] [center]Nothing has been added![/center]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]Update log[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center]31/05/2010 - Equipment Tab added it will now open and close.[/center] [center]31/05/2010 - Some stupid Teleport GFX has been remove back to the Normal simple teleport.[/center] [center]1/05/2010 - Range following has been added (Looks buggy becuase of the 525 Anim of running)[/center] [center][u][b][size=14pt]Picture/videos[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3306/walking.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/3122/stancel.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/7728/ranging.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/7186/73365705.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/5964/heyws.jpg[/img] [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/5507/combatug.jpg[/img] [center][img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/93/44889103.jpg[/img][/center] [/center]
[center][size=14pt]Credits Delta Chosen pk[/size][/center]
[center] [size=14pt] [u][b]*Warning*[/b][/u][/size] [size=12pt]I know people are not very happy on the delta base i dont mind Ideas being posted but no Flaming please you dont see me going to your thread and Flaming at you.! No bad comments dont like dont comment just leave the thread![/size][/center]

item.title: [317] Project X [317] Look here! [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Fagex1 Fagex.
item.description:
@Fagex1 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:19, topic:342148”][quote author=Fagex. link=topic=438560.msg3225231#msg3225231 date=1275516339]
You’re an idiot. Ask Graham even.

Obviously hyperion will decline at a MUCH slower rate. But no matter the source- the more you add to the code, the more it needs to be read/processed = it will slowly gain lag.

No matter what you code- as you add more it slowwwwwlllly will gain more lag. Common sense. Load your truck with 1 ton and see if it goes faster than without.
[/quote]

Not if coded properly. If the base is the only thing that is static, and everything is loaded on-the-fly WHEN AND ONLY WHEN THEY"RE NEEDED, it will VERY RARELY decrease in performance.[/quote]
True- but somewhat. It still decreases in performance. It’s law. Everything will gradually decrease.

Due to the nature of Hyperion though, that rate is FAAAARRRR slower than any wL server.

Shard though is just as bad as any wL.

Read full topic

No matter what you code- as you add more it slowwwwwlllly will gain more lag. Common sense. Load your truck with 1 ton and see if it goes faster than without.[/quote]

Not if coded properly. If the base is the only thing that is static, and everything is loaded on-the-fly WHEN AND ONLY WHEN THEY"RE NEEDED, it will VERY RARELY decrease in performance.

Hyperion is way better…

Of course. but load it with as much shit and it’ll lose performance- still probably better off.

You really have no idea what you’re talking about.
[/quote]
I know Hyperion is way more stable- hence I said yes. I agree. But still no MATTER WHAT SOURCE YOU USE, when you load things up onto it, and the more code you put, stability will decrease ALWAYS. It’s a given rule.[/quote]

Not if developed properly. Obviously the sources you’ve used haven’t been.

item.title: [317] Project X [317] Look here! [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Fagex1 Fagex.
item.description:
@Fagex1 wrote:

Infinity Zr:

so how many players do you thing Delta will hold with a dual core processer 1gb of ram and 250gb hdd and 1TB hard-drive?

DeltaClean maybe 100 at most.

Normal Delta would reach like 20 I imagine…

Your processor isn’t that bad, but your ram kills it. Most OS’s need at least 256 MB just to run- leaving you only around 700ish to support a Delta… Eww.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project X [317] Look here! [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Fagex1 Fagex.
item.description:
@Fagex1 wrote:

I am using DeltaClean 2.0. It’s barerly like Delta at all. Infact almost nothing. It’s been reduced to almost nothing but the bare parts of Delta, and more was added to make it stable etc.

It’s just as stable as Devo, Emulous, and most of the other wL sources.

Hyperion is the most stable, but it has barerly anything and needs alot of work to add everything. And in the end when everything is loaded with shit, nothings stable. ONLY Hyperion is still more stable.

DeltaClean can hold 400 players easy- which is more than the average server would get.

I use to swear by Shard, but developing took to long. I rather work with Devo or something and get a fun source out people love then spend 2 years developing a server that in the end no-one will play.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Project X [317] Look here! [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]
Currently Working on the Server[/center]
[center]-- Infinity Zr (me) --[/center]

[center]What is Project X?[/center]
[center]Project X is a server for people to have fun on there will be no Buying/selling Staff spots! This will be based of Delta/Chosen pkz[/center]

[center]Why this server[/center]
[center]Becuase it is a delta/chosen pkz source i am able to learn more from it instead of shooting to Hyperon/Riotscape sources i want to take my time through a delta source before going onto the more cleaned and stable sources![/center]

[center]Forums/Host[/center]
[center]The forums will be a SMF dont want to get Nulled vbulletin! The host will be on my Pc a Dual core Processer with 1gb of ram and 250gb of HDD i am hoping this will hold 50+ players[/center]

[center]Client/Server coders[/center]
[center]Yes i will need client coders but not at the very moment atm i know alot about Clients so i think i will be able to manage i will let you know if i need Server/Client coders but atm i dont need any![/center]

[center]What are you trying to Accomplish[/center]
[center]Nothing i just want to get players and a great community.[/center]

[center]Customs Items[/center]
[center]There will be customs like GodSwords/D claws but there will be nothing like Crappy Recoloured of stupid swords ect…[/center]

[center]Minigames[/center]
[center]There will be 90% pest control i am working on atm (Not sure if im going to add the npcs)
Barrows 50% stupid methods.!
Fighting caves 70% there needs to be a reward and a correct timer!
assault minigame keeping the same CBA with that Tbh its 100% UGLY![/center]

[center]Combat/skills[/center]
[center]Attack 10% redoing the hole System will post a pic later
strenght 100%
Magic 90% Mage done
Range 100% Range Done
Hp 100%
Defence 100%
Prayer 85% Need the new prayer interface

Non Combat skills
WoodCutting 100% you now need the certain axes to WC
Firemaking 100% works fine to me
Herblore 50% Shitty delta base
Farming 50% shitty delta base
Aglity 70% not a very good base
Thieving 100% done It is now handle in a handler (Thieving.java)
RuneCraft 100% going to leave it and maybe update in the future
Crafting 88% just need to add some more junk instead of crafting amulets
Fletching 100% works fine (delta base 100% credits to him)
Slayer 80% adding some more areas
Mining/Smithing 90% interfaces are not added.
Fishing/cooking 90% adding more places to fish and Adding a method to cook on a fire (Maybe add a certain level to cook fish on logs.)[/center]

[center]Client Update log
[/center]
[center]Nothing has been added![/center]

[center][size=14pt]Update log[/size][/center]
[center]31/05/2010 - Equipment Tab added it will now open and close.[/center]
[center]31/05/2010 - Some stupid Teleport GFX has been remove back to the Normal simple teleport.[/center]
[center]1/05/2010 - Range following has been added (Looks buggy becuase of the 525 Anim of running)[/center]

Warning[/size]
[size=12pt]I know people are not very happy on the delta base i dont mind Ideas being posted but no Flaming please you dont see me going to your thread and Flaming at you.! No bad comments dont like dont comment just leave the thread![/size][/center]
